TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed TypeLibImporterFlags extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Indicates how an assembly should be produced.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This enumeration is used with the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.TypeLibConverter.ConvertTypeLibToAssembly%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.TypeLibImporterFlags ImportAsAgnostic = int32(2048)

Docs.summary: Imports a type library for any platform.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.TypeLibImporterFlags ImportAsArm = int32(16384)

Docs.summary: Imports a library for the ARM platform.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.TypeLibImporterFlags ImportAsItanium = int32(1024)

Docs.summary: Imports a type library for the Itanium platform.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.TypeLibImporterFlags ImportAsX64 = int32(512)

Docs.summary: Imports a type library for the x86 64-bit platform.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.TypeLibImporterFlags ImportAsX86 = int32(256)

Docs.summary: Imports a type library for the x86 platform.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.TypeLibImporterFlags NoDefineVersionResource = int32(8192)

Docs.summary: Prevents inclusion of a version resource in the interop assembly. For more information, see the M:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder.DefineVersionInfoResource?qualifyHint=True&autoUpgrade=True method.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.TypeLibImporterFlags None = int32(0)

Docs.summary: No special settings. This is the default.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.TypeLibImporterFlags PreventClassMembers = int32(16)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.TypeLibImporterFlags PrimaryInteropAssembly = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Generates a primary interop assembly. For more information, see the T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.PrimaryInteropAssemblyAttribute?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True attribute. A keyfile must be specified.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.TypeLibImporterFlags ReflectionOnlyLoading = int32(4096)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.TypeLibImporterFlags SafeArrayAsSystemArray = int32(4)

Docs.summary: Imports all `SAFEARRAY` instances as T:System.Array?qualifyHint=True&autoUpgrade=True instead of typed, single-dimensional, zero-based managed arrays. This option is useful when dealing with multi-dimensional, non-zero-based `SAFEARRAY` instances, which otherwise cannot be accessed unless you edit the resulting assembly by using the MSIL Disassembler (Ildasm.exe) and MSIL Assembler (Ilasm.exe) tools.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.TypeLibImporterFlags SerializableValueClasses = int32(32)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.TypeLibImporterFlags TransformDispRetVals = int32(8)

Docs.summary: Transforms `[out, retval]` parameters of methods on dispatch-only interfaces ([dispinterface](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/e8c18ae5-3d9e-4dff-aa20-b5acc723eacf)) into return values.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.TypeLibImporterFlags UnsafeInterfaces = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Imports all interfaces as interfaces that suppress the common language runtime's stack crawl for F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode?qualifyHint=True&autoUpgrade=True permission. Be sure you understand the responsibilities associated with suppressing this security check.
